hero.description: We enable intelligent healthcare capabilities through a
hero.descEnd: that ensures efficiency and financial predictability in the Latin American context.

manifesto.title: What we
manifesto.p1: The healthcare sector has fallen into the trap of algorithmic efficiency. We've filled institutions with software that automates chaos instead of solving it. AI promises precision, but without a systemic thinking structure, it's only accelerating wrong decisions.
manifesto.p2: At OxLER, we don't see the healthcare system as a sum of providers and payers, but as a
manifesto.p2Highlight: fabric of critical decisions under pressure.
manifesto.not1Title: We are not a software factory.
manifesto.not1Desc: At OxLER, we don't sell software. We build the thinking infrastructure that makes technology useful.
manifesto.not2Desc: We move from AI as a tool (just another gadget) to AI as an operating system (PENTA + CaaS).
manifesto.not3Title: We are not advocates of "total automation".
manifesto.obsP1End: : ensuring the right data reaches the right human, with the right interpretation, at the exact millisecond the decision must be made.
manifesto.obsP2End: : where AI assumes the administrative cognitive load to create real efficiencies, from deep medicine.
manifesto.finalQuote: "We don't automate processes to save money; we orchestrate decision systems."

ciclo.title: The
ciclo.description: A continuous production system where each line enables and enhances the next, generating cumulative capabilities for the client.
ciclo.diagramAlt: OxLER Cycle Diagram – Sustainable Efficiency and Risk Control
ciclo.diagramCaption: Sustainable Efficiency and Risk Control — OxLER Decision Architecture
ciclo.stage1Desc: Our 5-axis optimization methodology: population analysis, clinical management, value auditing, technology management, and contracting.
ciclo.stage1Tech: We enable a structured decision framework in the client that reduces operational variability. The 5 PENTA axes act as an organizational diagnostic system that identifies efficiency gaps and generates optimization roadmaps with measurable KPIs.
ciclo.stage2Desc: Design of customized solutions integrated with PENTA, using Agents and Multi-Agent Systems.
ciclo.stage2Tech: We deploy specialized AI agent architectures that integrate natively with the PENTA framework. Each biodigital solution is calibrated with real client data, enabling intelligent automation of audits, cost prediction, and real-time clinical pathway optimization.
ciclo.stage3Desc: Training human teams for real technology adoption and upskilling in exponential medicine.
ciclo.stage3Tech: We close the cycle by ensuring technological capabilities transfer to the client's human talent. Training programs in applied AI for health, predictive dashboard interpretation, and multi-agent system operation ensure transformation sustainability.
ciclo.stage4Desc: Research of real failures, clinical validation of AI/ML models, therapeutic value analysis, and open knowledge production.
ciclo.stage4Tech: We identify inefficiencies through real-world data (RWD/TWE). We validate each AI/ML tool with rigorous matrices and real clinical outcomes. We apply proprietary MCDA and Health Economics (HEOR) models to evaluate therapeutic value. We transform data into open scientific publications, ensuring transparency and rigor.
ciclo.statement: We are the next level in

penta.title: The
penta.description: Five integrated pillars that form the complete infrastructure for healthcare digital transformation.
penta.p1Desc: We transform data into population intelligence to optimize the gateway to the healthcare system.
penta.p1Point2: Redesign of comprehensive pathways and screening program optimization.
penta.p1Point3: Biodigital architecture for clinical data structuring.
penta.p2Desc: We eliminate unjustified clinical variability through medical practices strictly guided by data.
penta.p2Point1: Evidence-based clinical harmonization in the local network context.
penta.p2Point2: Inefficiency evaluation through peer technical engagement.
penta.p2Point3: Clinical risk stratification using Machine Learning (ML).
penta.p3Desc: We evolve traditional auditing into a concurrent model that ensures technical relevance and safety.
penta.p3Point1: Evaluation under the adapted ASCO QOPI matrix (with international publication).
penta.p3Point2: Waste management focused on patient quality and safety.
penta.p3Point3: Automated detection of unjustified care variations.
penta.p4Desc: We maximize the impact of high-cost technologies through scientific prioritization criteria.
penta.p4Point1: Health Technology Assessments (HTA) and multicriteria matrices (MCDA).
penta.p4Point2: Specialized module in Targeted Therapies and Precision Oncology.
penta.p4Point3: Design and implementation of managed access agreements (MEAs).
penta.p5Desc: We redesign the payer-provider relationship through architectures that reward performance and outcomes.
penta.p5Point2: Severity and complexity risk adjusters (Oncological case-mix).
penta.p5Point3: Implementation of shared risk and pay-for-performance (P4P) models.

agents.title: Autonomous
agents.description: From generative AI to resolutive AI: agents that don't just respond, but decide under human supervision and CAS (Context Aware Systems).

oncoagent.purpose: Reduce clinical variability and the administrative burden on human auditors.
oncoagent.cap1Desc: Immediate validation of technical relevance under international and national standards (NCCN, ASCO).
oncoagent.cap2Desc: Transforms dense clinical records into actionable decision nodes.
oncoagent.cap3Desc: Acts as a technical bridge between provider and payer to streamline treatment access.

pegaxus.purpose: Transform financial uncertainty into predictability through therapeutic value analysis.
pegaxus.cap1Desc: Modeling of managed access agreements and shared risks. Precision technical notes.
pegaxus.cap2Desc: Objective evaluation of the value of new technologies and high-cost medications.
pegaxus.cap3Desc: Budget impact projection based on real-world data (RWD).

services.title: What we
services.s1Desc: Design and implementation of frameworks for data-driven and evidence-based decision making.
services.s2Desc: Mathematical algorithms to optimize resources, processes, and outcomes in healthcare institutions.
services.s3Desc: Pipelines, data lakes, and architectures for interoperability in medical information systems.
services.s4Desc: RPA and AI applied to operational flows: billing, auditing, quality management, and more.
services.s5Desc: Machine learning models and intelligent agents designed for the clinical and administrative domain.
services.s6Desc: Health technology assessment, pharmacoeconomic models, and access strategies. Application of Multicriteria Decision Matrices (MCDA) and advisory on negotiation models.
services.s7Desc: Design of disruptive educational events and e-learning platforms using AI technologies, active methodologies, and behavioral epistemology.
services.uciaSubtitle: The evolution from traditional service to the Intelligent Decision Node.
services.uciaT1: Transform conventional medical services into high-efficiency centers where AI acts as an institutional operating system.
services.uciaT2: Implementation of operational model, clinical governance, and ethics to ensure medical AI lands properly in healthcare institutions.
services.uciaT3: Governance system, operational manual, profitability model, legal, technological, bioethical axes. Clinical MLOps cycle and medical sandboxes.
services.uciaT4: An institution that uses AI as a central element, not as digital snobbery.

oxlearning.title: Education for
oxlearning.description: The most advanced technology fails in the hands of an analog culture. OxLEARNING is our education line designed to bridge the capacity gap between technological innovation and real practice, transforming human teams into exponential medicine operators.
oxlearning.platformDesc: We enable a digital ecosystem of continuous training where technical knowledge meets clinical application.
oxlearning.platformAccessDesc: Our exclusive platform offers unique training designed by experts for healthcare leaders in Colombia and LATAM.
oxlearning.eventsDesc: We don't teach classes; we design knowledge transfer experiences supported by digital infrastructure.
oxlearning.eventsItem1Desc: We integrate active methodologies to maximize practical learning in high-pressure environments.
oxlearning.eventsItem2Desc: We run specialized Bootcamps (e.g., Breast Cancer Bootcamp), focus groups, and high-performance Advisory Boards with advanced technological support.
oxlearning.eventsItem3Desc: Each event uses AI and analytics tools for traceability and real-time decision making.
oxlearning.upskillingDesc: We develop foundational and technical deep-dive programs for the new roles of biodigital health.
oxlearning.upskill1Desc: Courses from "Ridiculously Simple Artificial Intelligence" to deep-dive Prompting for Oncology Auditing.
oxlearning.upskill2Desc: Training in Oncology Contracting modalities to balance finances and generate value.
oxlearning.upskill3Desc: Evidence-based specialization with scientific rigor for inefficiency management.
oxlearning.upskill4Desc: The Structural Leap towards Algorithmic Governance. Transform AI from an isolated "gadget" to an Institutional Operating System that orchestrates decision-making. Design the architecture of thought and Safety Limits to scale intelligence without compromising clinical rigor. Creation of Clinical AI Units (CIAU) under governance, ethics, and financial predictability standards.

team.title: Our
team.description: We are a transdisciplinary collective where specialist physicians, data scientists, health economists, and developers work together. This fusion allows us to understand clinical language with empathy and solve it with algorithmic precision.
team.footer: We speak the language of the patient and the language of data with equal fluency.

allies.title: Our
allies.description: We collaborate with pharmaceutical industry leaders, key healthcare stakeholders, and academic excellence centers in Colombia, Peru, and Ecuador to create exponential medicine.

cta.title: How can we
cta.whatsappMessage: Hello OxLER, I'm interested in learning more about your healthcare solutions.
cta.c1: Do you want to redesign your management or service model and turn it into intelligent units?
cta.c2: Do you have high clinical variability and cost volatility, and need to adjust clinical and administrative levers?
cta.c3: Do you want to properly create your medical AI strategy?
cta.c4: Do you want to know how we optimize using AI?
cta.c5: Do you want us to do a comprehensive diagnosis of your process using PENTA?

footer.description: Health Decision Architecture supported by AI, optimization models, and technological development.
